Wildrider and the Quintesson emerged in the room in which Dead-End was in.
"He could use some extensive repairs, and dont try anything funny, mphhhhh
ha ha fhaaaa".

The Quintesson moved up to the table, and started to look Dead-End over,
"hmmmmmmm" he used one of his tentacles to lift Dead-End's arm, then
switched heads, "hmmmmmmm, his damage is extensive" the Quintesson
anounced, "I know that genius, can you fix him?" Replied Wildrider angrily.

The Quintesson pulled out a wielding rifle, "I will need some spare metal
to make a new outer shell for him, but yesssssss, I can repair it" he
finished saying, as he whirled, changing heads again.
